Samurai history. Any websites or books to aid in an accurate
portrayal of the life of the Samurai would be most helpful. Thank
you for your assistance.

Gail




always the best place to start would be www.samurai-archives.com

you can also try http://mcel.pacificu.edu/as/students/bushido/bindex.html

http://www.ospreysamurai.com/

those should help with your delema.

Tom
